modules.description: Provides optics for accessing and modifying fields in records and constructors, supporting composition for nested data. Works with OCaml record types and variant constructors, enabling direct manipulation of deeply nested values. Allows concise updates to specific fields in complex data structures without manual recursion.

Provides functions to create and compose lenses for record fields and prisms for ADT constructors, enabling safe access and modification of nested data. Operates on OCaml records, variants, and option types, with support for polymorphic structures. Used to simplify updates in deeply nested records or to pattern match and transform ADT values without manual recursion.
